## BitMatrix class

MxN row-major 2D bit matrix, backed by a Uint32Array. Width is always a multiple of 32.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BitMatrix 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m, n)](./bitfield.bitmatrix._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BitMatrix</code> class |

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./bitfield.bitmatrix.data.md) |  | <code>Uint32Array</code> |  |
|  [m](./bitfield.bitmatrix.m.md) |  | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [n](./bitfield.bitmatrix.n.md) |  | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [stride](./bitfield.bitmatrix.stride.md) |  | <code>number</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [at(m, n)](./bitfield.bitmatrix.at.md) |  | Returns a non-zero value if bit at <code>m,n</code> is enabled (row major). No bounds checking. |
|  [resize(m, n)](./bitfield.bitmatrix.resize.md) |  | Resizes matrix to new size given (width always rounded up to multiples of 32). |
|  [setAt(m, n, v)](./bitfield.bitmatrix.setat.md) |  | Enables or disables bit at <code>m,n</code> (row major). Returns a non-zero value if the bit was previously enabled. No bounds checking. . |
|  [toString()](./bitfield.bitmatrix.tostring.md) |  |  |
